ROYAL POSTUREAND YOUNG FACE

IMPROVE YOUR POSTURE AND CONFIDENCEAT ANY AGE

Start February 12

THIS COURSE IS FOR THOSE WHO WANT:

Improve posture and increase back flexibility

Stop slouching and fix a neck hump, relieve neck and back tension

Look younger, smooth out fine lines, wrinkles and get rid of a double chin

Tone your stomach and get rid of love handles! Yes, your back and stomach are interconnected

Create a toned body without lifting weights. We will focus on proper breathing and working with our posture

Get rid of headaches and improve your sleep

Relieve neck and back pain from sitting at a desk

If you are a mom and want to get back in shape and fix your posture after pregnancy

Improve your self-esteem and learn how to love yourself

✖ THE PROGRAM IS NOT SUITABLE FOR:

Pregnant

Safety of the fetus is the first priority during pregnancy. Any physical exercises must be approved by your doctor.

✖ Those who want to lose weight - This is not a weight loss marathon. But! Participants can reduce weight by 3-5kg by activating their lymphatic system and getting rid of excess fluid. The waist reduction can be from 5cm to 15cm.

WHAT'S INSIDE

MODULE 1. FLEXIBLE BACK AND GOOD POSTURE

  • 25-30 minute workouts to improve back flexibility and correct asymmetry
  • Exercises to relieve shoulder girdle and neck tension
  • Convenient video format with voice guidance of the trainer and captions

BONUSES:

  • Access to a closed library: 50+ articles from doctors, a cosmetologist and a massage therapist about body and face care, posture, how to remove fat from the neck hump and much more

MODULE FINAL RESULTS:

  • You will form and strengthen the neutral position of the spine
  • You will develop chest mobility
  • You will begin to fix the neck hump and posture

MODULE 2. LYMPHODRAINAGE AND WOMEN'S HEALTH

  • Activate the lymphatic system to reduce edema
  • Foot mobility and massage
  • Strengthen the pelvic floor muscles and tighten up the glutes
  • Increase hip joint mobility
  • Treat pelvic floor dysfunction
  • Learn how to breathe properly, work with the diaphragm to reduce a bulging belly
  • MFR complexes that will replace a massage therapist - will allow you to relax more deeply and treat muscle spasms

INCLUDES:

  • 10 min lymphatic drainage exercises for the whole body
  • Morning exercises to relieve swelling from the whole body
  • 20 min pelvic floor recovery workout

BONUSES:

  • Online training with a yoga instructor to stimulate lymph flow and stretch your spine
  • Anti cellulite home SPA techniques
  • Osteopathic self-massage to relax your neck and lower back

MODULE FINAL RESULTS:

  • You will reduce edema, normalize lymphatic system function and boost the immune system
  • You will get rid of excess fluids in your body which can help you lose weight
  • You will strengthen your pelvic floor muscles, which helps to relieve menstrual cramps, improve your overall health after pregnancy

MODULE 3. NATURAL REJUVENATION FOR FACE AND NECK

  • Tighten face lines and look less tired
  • Get rid of a double chin and create a more defined jawline
  • Fix facial symmetry
  • Smooth out forehead wrinkles and nasolabial folds
  • Includes 5-10 min techniques for facial rejuvenation at home
  • 5 min complexes to reduce facial swelling and eye bags
  • Elongate the neck, get rid of Venus Rings (neck wrinkles)
  • Includes 5 min complexes to fix drooping eyelids

BONUSES:

  • Master classes/consultations from a cosmetologist on natural skin rejuvenation
  • Master class from a makeup artist (makeup artist fashion week)
  • Master class on how to choose skincare products for your skin type

MODULE FINAL RESULTS:

  • You will smooth out mimic wrinkles and nasolabial folds, correct asymmetry and get rid of a double chin
  • You will learn simple techniques to fight fatigue, remove dark circles under eyes and reduce facial puffiness

MODULE 4. PSYCHOSOMATICS ASPECTS OF CLAMPING, TIPS TO OVERCOME ANXIETY

  • Learn how to motivate yourself to achieve results and ease the symptoms of anxiety
  • Self-doubt, and how it affects your life and physical health
  • How to build self-confidence and improve the quality of life

BONUSES:

  • Practice sessions with a psychologist to reduce stress and emotional clamps
  • Masterclass from a sexologist - "How does inner confidence affect all areas of life?"

MODULE FINAL RESULTS:

  • You will feel stronger and more energetic to set new goals and achieve them
  • You will believe in yourself and increase self-esteem, remove muscle blocks and learn to live a happier life

The program is based on gentle stretching techniques and does not require special training preparation. It includes the methods of exercise therapy and pilates

THESE SPECIALISTS WORKED ON THE PROGRAM:

  • Master of Sports in rhythmic gymnastics and FPA coach
  • Doctors of Osteopathic Medicine
  • Exercise Rehabilitation Instructor (ERI)
  • Cervical and vertebral spine rehabilitation specialist
  • Yoga instructor and pelvic floor physiotherapist
  • Cosmetologist
  • Psychologist

WHAT WILL THE PROGRAM GIVE YOU?

Good and beautiful posture

You will stop slouching and get rid of a neck hump

You will get your body fit and toned

You will improve your sleep and relieve headaches

You will reduce facial puffiness and dark circles under eyes, as well as create a more defined jawline and get rid of a double chin

You will learn how to rest your back muscles after a long day

  • 10 lymphatic drainage complexes to reduce edema

HOW DOES THE MARATHON HELP ACHIEVE SUCH RESULTS?

PROGRAM

A well-elaborated program without torturing your body will help you integrate the exercises into your daily routine so that you won't notice how your hands perform manipulations for your rejuvenation!

YOUR INNER CONDITION

We will kindle the flame of LOVE for ourselves! Without love for yourself, without a strong desire to be healthy, no result can be achieved. This is the reason why it is so important to have a trainer and like-minded fellows to cheer you up during moments of weakness, to share success and useful life hacks.

MOTIVATION

Transformation opportunities are more motivating than a whip! Daily reports will help you become more disciplined as well. We also have a members only chat where you will receive support and motivation.

NUTRITION

We won't change your diet. I will only ask you to avoid 3 foods and not to eat unhealthy products during the marathon.

AS A RESULT

You get a perfect plan that step by step leads you to natural rejuvenation and a healthy posture.

First, from the inside:

  • improved well-being, no fatigue, you begin to feel more energetic
  • relieved headaches, back and neck pains

Then - outside:

  • reduced face and body swelling
  • toned body and strong posture
  • visually you start to look younger

Only 10-30 minutes a day in a comfortable environment

ANSWERS TO FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Can you accept international payments?

Yes, we accept international payments. You can use major credit and debit cards, PayPal, and other secure online payment methods to join our program, regardless of your location.

CONTRAINDICATIONS for participation:

Participation in the program may not be suitable for individuals with certain health conditions. If you have any chronic diseases, recent injuries, or other medical concerns, please consult with your healthcare provider before joining. It's essential to ensure that the exercises are safe for your specific health situation.

When does the program start/end?

The program is designed to start whenever you are ready. You will have access to all the materials and instructions upon registration. The duration of the program is typically 12 weeks, but you can pace yourself according to your personal schedule.

I work full time, and also have a baby, do housecleaning, cooking, etc. What should I do?

We understand that life can be very busy. Our program is flexible and can be adjusted to fit your schedule. You can do the exercises at any time that is convenient for you, whether it's early in the morning, during your lunch break, or in the evening after your household duties.

Do I need to purchase equipment to exercise with you?

No, you do not need to purchase any special equipment to participate in our program. All exercises are designed to be done using your body weight and common household items.

Do I need to buy any equipment?

All exercises are designed to be done using your body weight and common household items.

How many times a week should I do the exercises?

For optimal results, we recommend doing the exercises 3-4 times a week. However, the program is flexible, and you can adjust the frequency based on your personal schedule and fitness level.

I can't do the exercises every day. What should I do?

That's perfectly fine. The program is designed to be flexible. You can follow the exercises at your own pace and adjust the frequency to fit your schedule. Consistency is more important than daily exercise.

How do I receive tasks and where should I send the reports?

You will receive your tasks and exercises through our online platform. Detailed instructions and videos will be available in your account. Reports can be submitted directly through the platform or sent via email, depending on what is more convenient for you.

What's the deadline for sending a daily report?

There is no strict deadline for sending daily reports. However, for the best results and to track your progress effectively, it is recommended to submit your report by the end of each day after completing the exercises.

Is it mandatory to send the report?

Submitting reports is not mandatory but highly encouraged. Sending reports helps you stay accountable and allows us to provide you with personalized feedback and support.

Is my health suitable for the program?

If you are generally healthy and have no major medical conditions, you should be able to participate in the program. However, if you have any health concerns, it is important to consult with your healthcare provider before starting the program to ensure it is safe for you.

Can I participate if I have a chronic disease?

Participation may be possible if you have a chronic disease, but it is crucial to consult with your healthcare provider first. They can provide guidance on whether the exercises are appropriate for your condition and any modifications you might need.

Are there weight/age limitations?

There are no specific weight or age limitations for participating in our program. The exercises can be modified to suit various fitness levels and ages. However, we recommend consulting with a healthcare provider if you have any specific concerns.

Can I participate in the program if I live in another country?

Yes, you can participate in the program from anywhere in the world. Our online platform allows you to access all materials and support remotely.

How can I pay for my participation in the project if I am abroad?

International participants can pay using major credit cards, PayPal, and other secure online payment methods. We strive to make the payment process as smooth as possible for participants from all over the world.

I have paid for my participation. When do I receive my login name and password?

Once your payment is confirmed, you will receive an email with your login name and password within 24 hours. This will grant you access to our online platform where you can start the program immediately. If you do not receive your login details within this timeframe, please contact our support team for assistance.
